description: Describes the specified replication job or all of your replication jobs.

nested_items.name: replicationJobList
nested_items.description: Information about the replication jobs.

nested_items.name: replicationJobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the replication job.

nested_items.name: serverId
nested_items.description: The ID of the server.

nested_items.name: serverType
nested_items.description: The type of server.

nested_items.name: vmServerAddress
nested_items.description: The VM server location.

nested_items.name: vmManagerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VM manager.

nested_items.name: vmId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VM.

nested_items.name: vmName
nested_items.description: The name of the VM.

nested_items.name: vmManagerName
nested_items.description: The name of the VM manager.

nested_items.name: vmManagerType
nested_items.description: The type of VM management product.

nested_items.name: vmPath
nested_items.description: The VM folder path in the vCenter Server virtual machine inventory tree.

nested_items.name: seedReplicationTime
nested_items.description: The seed replication time.

nested_items.name: frequency
nested_items.description: The time between consecutive replication runs, in hours.

nested_items.name: runOnce
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to run the replication job one time.

nested_items.name: nextReplicationRunStartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the next replication run.

nested_items.name: licenseType
nested_items.description: The license type to be used for the AMI created by a successful replication run.

nested_items.name: roleName
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM role to be used by Server Migration Service.

nested_items.name: latestAmiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the latest Amazon Machine Image (AMI).

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the replication job.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The description of the current status of the replication job.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the replication job.

nested_items.name: numberOfRecentAmisToKeep
nested_items.description: The number of recent AMIs to keep in the customer's account for a replication job. By default, the value is set to zero, meaning that all AMIs are kept.

nested_items.name: encrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the replication job should produce encrypted AMIs.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key for replication jobs that produce encrypted AMIs. This value can be any of the following:
KMS key ID.
KMS key alias.
ARN referring to the KMS key ID.
ARN referring to the KMS key alias.

nested_items.name: replicationRunList
nested_items.description: Information about the replication runs.

nested_items.name: replicationRunId
nested_items.description: The ID of the replication run.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the replication run.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of replication run.

nested_items.name: stageDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the current stage of the replication run.

nested_items.name: stage
nested_items.description: The current stage of a replication run.

nested_items.name: stageProgress
nested_items.description: The progress of the current stage of a replication run.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The description of the current status of the replication job.

nested_items.name: amiId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) from the replication run.

nested_items.name: scheduledStartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the next replication run.

nested_items.name: completedTime
nested_items.description: The completion time of the last replication run.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the replication run.

nested_items.name: encrypted
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the replication run should produce an encrypted AMI.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key for replication jobs that produce encrypted AMIs. This value can be any of the following:
KMS key ID.
KMS key alias.
ARN referring to the KMS key ID.
ARN referring to the KMS key alias.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token required to retrieve the next set of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
